kyc.isme.indv.sql: SELECT RPAD(' ',11,' ')||RPAD(A.CIS_NO,11,' ')||RPAD(NVL(A.ID_NO,' '),20,' ')||NVL2(BIRTH_DATE,TO_CHAR(B.BIRTH_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD'),' ')||RPAD(NVL(B.BIRTH_PLACE,' '),20,' ')||RPAD(NVL(A.MOTHER_MAIDEN,' '),20,' ')||RPAD(NVL(A.BIZ_ADDR_LINE1,' '),40,' ')||RPAD(NVL(A.BIZ_ADDR_LINE2,' '),40,' ')||RPAD(NVL(A.BIZ_ADDR_LINE3,' '),40,' ')||RPAD(NVL(A.BIZ_ADDR_LINE4,' '),40,' ')||SUBSTR(NVL(A.JOB_POS_CD,'009'),2,2)||' '||SUBSTR(TRIM(C.BRANCH_CD),0,4)||TO_CHAR(A.DATE_CREATED, 'YYYYMMDD')||'ISME' FROM SME_APP_CUST A, SME_CUST B, SME_APP C WHERE A.CUST_ID = B.CUST_ID AND A.APP_ID = C.ID AND A.DATE_CREATED = (SELECT MAX(DATE_CREATED) FROM SME_APP_CUST WHERE CIS_NO = A.CIS_NO) AND A.CUST_TYPE_CD='I' ORDER BY A.CIS_NO, A.DATE_CREATED DESC

kyc.isme.org.sql: SELECT RPAD(' ',11,' ')||RPAD(A.CIS_NO,11,' ')||RPAD(' ',20,' ')||RPAD(NVL(A.BIZ_ADDR_LINE1,' '),40,' ')||RPAD(NVL(A.BIZ_ADDR_LINE2,' '),40,' ')||RPAD(NVL(A.BIZ_ADDR_LINE3,' '),40,' ')||RPAD(NVL(A.BIZ_ADDR_LINE4,' '),40,' ')||CASE WHEN A.CUST_CAT_CD = '01' THEN '001' WHEN A.CUST_CAT_CD = '02' THEN '002' WHEN A.CUST_CAT_CD = '03' THEN '003' WHEN A.CUST_CAT_CD = '04' THEN '004' WHEN A.CUST_CAT_CD = '08' THEN '008' WHEN A.CUST_CAT_CD = '13' THEN '013' WHEN A.CUST_CAT_CD = '16' THEN '016' ELSE ' ' END||RPAD(NVL((SELECT UPPER(DSC) FROM SME_MT_STD WHERE GROUP_ID=63 AND CODE=A.BCA_COM_SECTOR_CD),' '),30,' ')||CASE WHEN (NVL(B.CURR_CASH_IN_MONTH,0)+NVL(B.CURR_ACC_RECV,0)+NVL(B.CURR_INVENTORY,0)+NVL(B.CURR_FIXED_ASSET,0)+NVL(B.CURR_FIXED_ASSET_WO_DEPRE,0)+NVL(B.CURR_OTHER_CURR_ASSET,0)+NVL(B.CURR_OTHER_NON_CURR_ASSET,0))<=1000 THEN '001' WHEN (NVL(B.CURR_CASH_IN_MONTH,0)+NVL(B.CURR_ACC_RECV,0)+NVL(B.CURR_INVENTORY,0)+NVL(B.CURR_FIXED_ASSET,0)+NVL(B.CURR_FIXED_ASSET_WO_DEPRE,0)+NVL(B.CURR_OTHER_CURR_ASSET,0)+NVL(B.CURR_OTHER_NON_CURR_ASSET,0))<=10000 THEN '002' WHEN (NVL(B.CURR_CASH_IN_MONTH,0)+NVL(B.CURR_ACC_RECV,0)+NVL(B.CURR_INVENTORY,0)+NVL(B.CURR_FIXED_ASSET,0)+NVL(B.CURR_FIXED_ASSET_WO_DEPRE,0)+NVL(B.CURR_OTHER_CURR_ASSET,0)+NVL(B.CURR_OTHER_NON_CURR_ASSET,0))<=250000 THEN '003' ELSE '004' END||CASE WHEN NVL(B.CURR_YEARLY_TOTAL_SALE,0)<=1000 THEN '001' WHEN NVL(B.CURR_YEARLY_TOTAL_SALE,0)<=10000 THEN '002' WHEN NVL(B.CURR_YEARLY_TOTAL_SALE,0)<=250000 THEN '003' ELSE '004' END||SUBSTR(TRIM(C.BRANCH_CD),0,4)||TO_CHAR(A.DATE_CREATED, 'YYYYMMDD')||'ISME' FROM SME_APP_CUST A, SME_APP_FIN_STMT B, SME_APP C WHERE A.APP_ID=C.ID AND A.APP_ID = B.APP_ID AND A.DATE_CREATED = (SELECT MAX(DATE_CREATED) FROM SME_APP_CUST WHERE CIS_NO = A.CIS_NO) AND A.CUST_TYPE_CD='O' ORDER BY A.CIS_NO, A.DATE_CREATED DESC

skmr.general.info.sql: SELECT CIS_NO,CUSTOMER_NAME,NO_MEMO,BRANCH_CD, BRANCH_DSC,JENIS_PENGOLAHAN,CREDIT_MEMO_TYPE,IS_CASH_COVERED,DATE_APPLIED,DATE_OF_MEMO,CRF_SCORE,CRF_RR,ERF_SCORE,ERF_RR,FINAL_SCORE,SCORE_DATE,APP_STATUS,CREDIT_CAT,BCA_ECO_SECTOR_CD,DATE_REG,DEBTOR_SINCE,TOTAL_KUU,TOTAL_CAB_LAIN,TOTAL_FAC_LIMIT FROM (SELECT APP_CUST.CIS_NO AS CIS_NO,CUST.FULLNAME AS CUSTOMER_NAME,APP.REFF_NO AS NO_MEMO, APP.BRANCH_CD, (SELECT DSC FROM SME_SEC_MASTER_BRANCH IN1 WHERE IN1.BRANCH_CD=APP.BRANCH_CD AND ROWNUM=1) AS BRANCH_DSC,(SELECT DSC FROM SME_MT_STD WHERE GROUP_ID=106 AND CODE=APP.JENIS_PENGOLAHAN_CD) AS JENIS_PENGOLAHAN,APP.CREDIT_MEMO_TYPE_CD||' - '||(SELECT DSC FROM SME_MT_STD WHERE GROUP_ID=78 AND CODE=APP.CREDIT_MEMO_TYPE_CD) AS CREDIT_MEMO_TYPE,APP.IS_CASH_COVERED AS IS_CASH_COVERED,TO_CHAR(APP.DATE_APPLIED,'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE_APPLIED,TO_CHAR(APP.DATE_CREDIT_MEMO,'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE_OF_MEMO,SCORE_HIST.CRF_SCORE AS CRF_SCORE,SCORE_HIST.CRF_RR AS CRF_RR,SCORE_HIST.ERF_SCORE AS ERF_SCORE,SCORE_HIST.ERF_RR AS ERF_RR,SCORE_HIST.FINAL_SCORE AS FINAL_SCORE,TO_CHAR(SCORE_HIST.DATE_UPDATED, 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS SCORE_DATE,WF_HIST.APP_STATUS AS APP_STATUS,APP_CUST.CREDIT_CAT_CD||' - '||(SELECT DSC FROM SME_MT_STD WHERE GROUP_ID=68 AND CODE=APP_CUST.CREDIT_CAT_CD) AS CREDIT_CAT, APP_CUST.BCA_ECO_SECTOR_CD AS BCA_ECO_SECTOR_CD, TO_CHAR(APP_CUST.DATE_REG, 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE_REG,APP_CUST.BCA_DEBTOR_SINCE AS DEBTOR_SINCE,NVL((SELECT SUM(CURRENT_PLAFOND) FROM SME_APP_VW_GROUP_EKS_STUAN_USH WHERE APP_ID=APP.ID),0) AS TOTAL_KUU,NVL((SELECT SUM(CURRENT_PLAFOND) FROM SME_APP_VW_NEW_FACILITY_OTHER WHERE APP_ID=APP.ID),0) AS TOTAL_CAB_LAIN,NVL((SELECT SUM(FINAL_LIMIT) FROM SME_APP_VW_NEW_FACILITY WHERE APP_ID = APP.ID AND FAC_CD != 'OTHER'),0) AS TOTAL_FAC_LIMIT,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY APP.REFF_NO ORDER BY APP.DATE_CREATED DESC) AS RANK FROM SME_APP_CUST APP_CUST INNER JOIN SME_APP APP ON APP_CUST.APP_ID=APP.ID INNER JOIN SME_CUST CUST ON CUST.CUST_ID=APP_CUST.CUST_ID INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM SME_APP_WF_HISTORY WHERE STATUS=0) WF_HIST ON WF_HIST.APP_ID=APP.ID INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM SME_APP_APPR_SCORE WHERE APP_ID||'-'||TO_CHAR(DATE_UPDATED,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') IN (SELECT MAX(APP_ID||'-'||TO_CHAR(DATE_UPDATED,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) FROM SME_APP_APPR_SCORE GROUP BY APP_ID)) SCORE_HIST ON SCORE_HIST.APP_ID=APP.ID WHERE WF_HIST.APP_STATUS IN ('ApplicationCompleted','ApplicationRejected','Approved','Cancel','Decline','PendingCSPreparation','PendingCSReview1','PendingCSReview2','PendingCSTaskAssignment','PendingDisbApproval','PendingDisbInstruction','PendingDisbUpdate','PendingDisbVerify','PendingDisbursementInsApproval','PendingDisbursementResult','PendingLetterOfferPreparation','PendingLetterOfferReview','PendingLetterofOfferSent','Rejected') ORDER BY APP_CUST.CIS_NO, APP.REFF_NO) WHERE RANK=1

skmr.scoring.reason.sql: SELECT APP.REFF_NO,SCORE.REASON_BLACK,SCORE.REASON_GRAY,SCORE.REASON_SPECIAL_COND,SCORE.REASON_INCOMPLETE FROM (SELECT SCORE.APP_ID,REPLACE(SCORE.REASON_BLACK, CHR(38)||'gt;', '>') REASON_BLACK,REPLACE(SCORE.REASON_GRAY, CHR(38)||'gt;', '>') REASON_GRAY,REPLACE(SCORE.REASON_SPECIAL_COND, CHR(38)||'gt;', '>') REASON_SPECIAL_COND,REPLACE(SCORE.REASON_INCOMPLETE, CHR(38)||'gt;', '>') REASON_INCOMPLETE,ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY SCORE.APP_ID ORDER BY SCORE.DATE_UPDATED DESC) RANK FROM SME_APP_APPR_SCORE SCORE) SCORE INNER JOIN SME_APP APP ON SCORE.APP_ID=APP.ID WHERE RANK=1 ORDER BY REFF_NO
